messages.message: It’s slow but working for me

<!here> While using correct_orientation_fine=True with Google OCR, for a document we have observed that OCR text is getting reversed (i.e Lines at the end of the document are appearing on the top)

OCR Config:
{“languages”: [“en”, “zh-Hans”, “zh-Hant”, “hr”, “eo”, “cs”, “fr”, “de”, “ru”, “uk”, “ja”],“produce_metadata_list”: true, “produce_word_metadata”: true, “cache_pdf_results”: false, “force_image_ocr”: true, “correct_resolution_auto”: true, “correct_orientation_fine”:true, “reorient_words”: true}

Refer to record# 18, name=cafetestECD6FBA1-BA0A-4948-8A1C-AA7A302AA15A.jpg
